com.wizzer.mle.runtime.event

Class MleEventCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.event.MleEventCallback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMleCallback, IMleEventCallback

    public abstract class MleEventCallback
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMleEventCallback
    This abstract class may be used to register a callback handler for a specific event.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean m_enabled
      Flag indicating that the callback is enabled/disabled.

    • Method Detail

      • dispatch

        public abstract boolean dispatch(MleEvent event,
                                 java.lang.Object clientdata)
        The callback dispatch method. Extenders must implement this method to provide functionality specific to the handler.
        Specified by:
        dispatch in interface IMleEventCallback
        Parameters:
        event - The event that is being dispatched by the handler.
        clientdata - Client data registered with this handler.
        Returns:
        If the event is successfully dispatched, then true should be returned. Otherwise, false should be returned.
        See Also:
        IMleEventCallback.dispatch(com.wizzer.mle.runtime.event.MleEvent, java.lang.Object)

      • enable

        public void enable(boolean enable)
        Enable the callback handler.
        Specified by:
        enable in interface IMleCallback
        Parameters:
        enable - true should be used if the callback is to be enabled. Otherwise, false should be used to disable the callback.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Determine whether the callback is enabled.
        Specified by:
        isEnabled in interface IMleCallback
        Returns:
        true is returned if the callback is enabled. Otherwise, false will be returned.
